info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 27 at 8:37AM EST until December 28 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Broad River In NC At Boiling Springs affecting Cleveland County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Broad River In NC at Boiling Springs. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Action Stage. The Broad River is beginning to flood residential yards located off of Abe`s Mountain Rd. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 2.6 feet early Monday morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM EST.
